main_business: IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) and Electronics Recovery
description: Reconext is a global ITAD company offering end-to-end IT Asset Disposition services that prioritize data security and sustainability. They provide lifecycle services including returns management, testing & grading, repair & refurbishment, trade-in & buyback, and asset recovery for a wide range of electronic devices. Their mission is to extend the life of electronics, securely and sustainably, by recovering value from used devices and diverting them from landfills.
physical_address: 2250 William D Tate Ave, Grapevine, TX 76051, USA
summary: Reconext is a global IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) and electronics recovery company with over four decades of experience. Founded in 1983 as a TV repair shop in Frankfurt, the company has evolved through various entities (Teleplan, Valutech, Clover Wireless) and was rebranded as Reconext in 2020. They operate a global network of facilities across the Americas, Europe, and Asia, providing comprehensive lifecycle services for electronic devices. Their core business focuses on extending the life of electronics through secure, sustainable recovery processes, including testing, grading, repair, refurbishment, and asset recovery for enterprise IT, consumer electronics, networking equipment, data center hardware, and more. Reconext is certified to numerous international standards including R2v3, ISO 27001, and various ISO certifications, emphasizing their commitment to data security, quality, and environmental responsibility.
inventory_fit_assessment: EXCELLENT FIT. Reconext handles all of Yilong's 'Must Have' enterprise IT assets: Laptops, Desktops, Data Center Servers, Networking Equipment, and Storage (HDDs/SSDs). They explicitly process 'Enterprise Network & Data Storage,' 'Servers & Storage Devices,' and 'Networking Equipment.' They also offer 'Bonus Points' items like harvested components (high-value CPU, RAM, SSD/HDD), mentioning 'parts harvesting' and 'component-level lineage tracking.' Their condition requirements align perfectly: they offer 'Testing & Grading' with proprietary equipment to ensure devices pass 'stringent requirements,' and they have specific platforms for objective functional and cosmetic evaluation. They process devices for 'redeployment' and 'resale,' indicating they handle Grade A/B (Ready for Retail) and Tested Functional Grade C (Ready for Refurbishment) assets. No red flags regarding inventory type.
operational_fit_assessment: EXCELLENT FIT. Reconext is a pure B2B ITAD Processor and Asset Recovery Firm, not a retail reseller. They serve 'OEMs, cable, satellite, and mobile device operators, retailers, insurers, and other enterprises.' They hold the highly preferred R2v3 certification (mentioned across multiple facility pages) and numerous other relevant certifications (ISO 27001, etc.). Their sales channel is inherently wholesale/bulk, as they process millions of devices annually across global facilities and offer 'Asset Recovery' services to 'maximize the sales value of your used devices.' Their entire operation is built for volume, with facilities designed for 'high-volume' processing and 'global resale channels.' They explicitly support 'B2B and B2C fulfillment' and handle 'pallet/truckload quantities' through their logistics network. No operational red flags are present.
reasoning: Reconext is a near-perfect match for Yilong Business Limited's procurement needs. They are a large, global, certified ITAD processor with a strong focus on enterprise IT assets (servers, networking, storage, laptops/desktops) that Yilong requires. They operate a B2B wholesale model, have R2v3 and other key certifications, and their scale (processing millions of devices yearly across multiple US and global facilities) aligns with Yilong's $1.5M monthly budget. Their services include the testing, grading, and refurbishment that Yilong's 'High-Quality Refurbishment' model demands. The only minor note is that no specific sales or procurement email addresses were extracted from the provided content, but their 'Contact Us' page and general inquiry channels are available for initial outreach. This vendor is highly qualified and warrants immediate contact.
